About.Hours & facilities: Open during semesters Mon-Fri 9am-5pm; closed Christmas - New Year period. General reference assistance and copying services available.

About.Acquisition focus: All aspects of the operation of Hawkesbury Agricultural College (now University of Western Sydney, Hawkesbury), ranging from official reports to student activities. The Library is a repository for College/University journals, student newspapers and donations of personal papers and memorabilia from former students (99% in-house).

About.Major holdings: HAC Annual Reports 1891-1988. Hawkesbury Agricultural College: Student roll 1891-1917; Student cards; Photographs glass slides; College journal 1898-1995. Library: History of Hawkesbury Agricultural College / University of Western Sydney, Hawkesbury 1891-1991. Agriculture Section: Seed trials.
